text.div:
V3 Value SetParticipationIndirectTarget

Target that is not substantially present in the act and which is not directly affected by the act, but which will be a focus of the record or documentation of the act.

  • Include codes from http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-ParticipationType where concept is-a IND

name: v3.ParticipationIndirectTarget
title: V3 Value SetParticipationIndirectTarget
description: Target that is not substantially present in the act and which is not directly affected by the act, but which will be a focus of the record or documentation of the act.
